summary: This is a service request (EFTA00127552) for the installation of a new Nice Vision system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, located at 150 Park Row. The request was created on September 20, 2019, and assigned to Jeff Cranor, Justin Houston, and Jeff McKenzie, with Anil also involved in changing IP addresses on encoders.

connections.description: Both were assigned to the same service request for the Nice Vision system installation at MCC New York.
Jeff McKenzie was providing phone support to Anil to change IP addresses on encoders for the system installation.

events.title: Service request created for Nice Vision system installation
events.description: A service request (EFTA00127552) was created for the installation of a new Nice Vision system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: This document is a service request (EFTA00127552) for technical work at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
The request involves the installation of a new 'Nice Vision' system, which is likely a video surveillance or security system.
The request was created on September 20, 2019, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing facility maintenance.
The service was assigned to technicians Jeff Cranor, Justin Houston, and Jeff McKenzie, with Anil also involved in technical support.
